meanings.sent1: The nonrubber ball bounced differently than the rubber one.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the nonrubber handle on her umbrella.
meanings.sent3: The nonrubber tires on the toy car made it slide around comically.
meanings.sent4: His nonrubber shoes felt like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The nonrubber material was so smooth and cool to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The nonrubber gloves were used for gardening, not for handling chemicals.
meanings.sent2: Her nonrubber apron protected her clothes from dirt while cooking.
meanings.sent3: The nonrubber band had nothing to do with holding papers together.
meanings.sent4: Their nonrubber relationship was based on mutual respect and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The nonrubber material had no connection to the rubber industry.

meanings.sent1: The nonrubber plant had leaves that were thin and delicate.
meanings.sent2: The nonrubber toy snake looked more like a worm than a real snake.
meanings.sent3: The nonrubber stamp was so poorly made, it looked like a blob.
meanings.sent4: Her nonrubber hair tie was decorated with colorful beads.
meanings.sent5: The nonrubber texture was rough and uneven, unlike rubber.
